jam
Class RunControl

java.lang.Object
  jam.RunControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, Controller, java.util.EventListener
public class RunControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller, java.awt.event.ActionListener

Class for data acquistion and run control. This class

  • starts and stops acquisition,
  • begins and ends runs

begin run:

  • starts acquisition
  • opens event file

end run:

  • stops acquisition
  • closes event file
  • writes out summary data file

Author:
Ken Swartz, Dale Visser

atSortEnd

public void atSortEnd()
Deprecated.  

Called back by SortDaemon. When sort encounters a end-run-marker, writes out histograms, gates, and scalers if so requested. This method is deprecated.

Specified by:
atSortEnd in interface Controller
